items.title: Version 6.3.3
items.content: The next version will generate inline styles (not attributes) only for the core blocks. Updated the approach to avoid compatability issues with custom blocks/plugins. To enable this feature for your block please add '__experimentalStyles' as block support.

items.title: Special thanks to:
items.content: Translation contributors: Dan Caragea, Vlad T, Peter Smits, Olivier Van Eester, Pieterjan Deneys.
